website_summaries.verdict: The reliable quality of the North Face brand in a backpack that's perfect for school use.
pros: Lined inside pocket makes it possible to safely carry a laptop
Interior compartment to help organize pencils, keys, cell phone, and other items
cons: This backpack is an organizer, but does not have as much interior space as some others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful backpack🥳🥳
customer_reviews.text: I’m insanely happy with this backpack! It’s very good quality and sturdy. Definitely won’t rip mid-way through the year. It’s also the perfect size. I was really worried that it’d be too big, but it’s close to the size of a jansport which is a relief. It has 2 pockets, but lots of space for little things as well. The side pockets aren’t as generous as I thought they’d be. They barely fit my 21oz hydro flask. But overall the backpack is sooo nice and I’ll be using it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Pez

customer_reviews.title: No warranty, better to buy directly from North Face website
customer_reviews.text: The zipper for this backpack broke less than 6 months after it was purchased. In addition to this, the straps are not as comfortable as other backpacks from North Face I've owned in the past. Overall, I am disappointed to have bought this from Amazon and will only be buying future backpacks straight from the company. North Face is normally better quality than this.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Carry and protect your laptop
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy and comfortable. It supports your back. But, best of all: when you put your laptop inside, if you drop the backpack the laptop dos not hit the floor, and that's what I was looking for, to be able to protect and carry my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great for everything except a school book bag
customer_reviews.text: Probably a great daypack but not so great as a school book bag. The bags main compartment is oval shaped and not very well adapted to carrying boxy books or square items. The organizer pocket doesn’t go the entire length of the bag, just halfway so the bag doesn’t sit up when put down (always top heavy). Nice bag otherwise, just an inferior book bag.
customer_reviews.author: Letter Size

customer_reviews.title: Back to school 2018
customer_reviews.text: My high school student requested this bookbag, made my order from & within two days it arrived. Was a bit skeptical to order this bookbag but the material is sturdy & can tell this bookbag will last a long time. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Yadi Bozan

customer_reviews.title: Great size for on an ambulance
customer_reviews.text: I'm an EMT and got this backpack to carry my personal equipment onto the ambulance for my 12 hour shifts. It holds my keyboard, water, phone mount, chargers, and quite a bit more without taking up too much room. I got the yellow and gray version and it really stands out when trying to find it at night. Just a really convenient backpack to grab for work without having too many straps to get in the way or pockets to have to look through.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: nice bag, and not as small as other reviews said
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new backpack for college because my 4 year old Jansport from high school was trashed. The bag was packed nice, and had all the north face tags on it. It also fits my water bottle, which is cool since it always fell out of my other bag. Bag is really nice overall. :)
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, given that there's not enough space in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced, given that there's not enough space in the front (not deep enough) and weight is not distributed equally unless you're stuffing it full.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to love this backpack! I love tnf and knew I wanted a backpack for school from them. The backpack is high quality and hasn't let me down. I've given three stars because it is sooooo small. My laptop fits perfectly as does a couple of folders and maybe a novel--- but trying to fit anything else isn't happening. There is one big pocket and one small pocket. Too bad these backpacks last forever or I would consider getting a different one!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Tons of space with different compartments
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my junior year of high school. It hasn’t started yet so I can’t really say anything about the durability but I was very impressed when it came. It has a lot of different compartments for storing things and it came with its tags looking brand new. It side pocket also fits my swell bottle so I’m very excited to use it for school as I’ve heard many great things about north face
customer_reviews.author: anonymous123

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable & NOT KETCHUP RED!
customer_reviews.text: I have broad shoulders and the straps don’t feel comfortable. The stiff back piece feels uncomfortable. Further, as noted several times by others, THIS IS NOT KETCHUP RED! I took a chance and sure enough the backpack is a burnt orange or maybe what ketchup would look like if left to sit out for a week. I ended up going with my first choice of an Under Armour Hustle II. I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and adjustable travel.
customer_reviews.text: This pack is great for tech and supplies for hiking or traveling through airports or train stations. The only issue I have is the lack of small and medium interior pockets inside the largest compartment. Specifically because the majority of the small pockets are on the outside which makes the outside heavy and lopsided. Having a group of deeper compartments could allow for more balance. I suppose I could buy a tech bag. The large compartment feels like a pit for a travel pillow and blanket plus the MacBook Pro and iPad you are traveling with. I like being able to carry all my tools to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: christin wasson

customer_reviews.title: It won't stand up.
customer_reviews.text: The bottom is not flat, therefore it won't stand up on its own and I was unable to use it for that reason, otherwise it's a well made pack that has all the features I was looking for, including the mesh side pockets for water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Manfish

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to use on a trip through Europe this past summer. It served me well, providing ample storage while not weighing me down. It went with me through 7 countries and it still looks brand new. I enjoyed using this bag so much it has become my new daily driver, replacing my Timbuk2 messenger that I've used for the better part of a decade. I was also very surprised at how well fitting the bag was. At 6'5" and 325 pounds it's not easy finding bags that don't look 8 sizes too small, or that have straps fit for a child. Overall this is a fantastic bag, well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Enough space
customer_reviews.text: Amazing backpack my son loved it .. Its big enough for notebooks and lots of supplies
customer_reviews.author: Haidy Yulet

customer_reviews.title: Great Mid side day/overnight backpack
customer_reviews.text: I use a backpack daily and so far this has fulfilled all the needs I was looking for. Cons - top is smaller than base so you couldn’t load a bigger object you might if it was the same size - doesn’t stand up on its own. Pros - ample storage for overnight or for a carry on. - North Face quality - venting keeps my back dry during long rides Overall it’s great as long as you aren’t looking for something with larger capacity. The price fits the quality for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Toolman424

customer_reviews.title: Great support & quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack to use in college. It came very quickly and was incredibly sturdy so it was well worth the price tag. The only negative thing i have to say is it doesn’t offer a ton of room, but I’ll manage. Really impressed and would definitely recommend for college!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Donath

customer_reviews.title: Great for school !!
customer_reviews.text: I use this Backpack for high school everyday and it’s truly amazing. I used to need to buy backpacks every school year because they just would not last enough no even the whole school year. But this backpack is really different and I mean it , the school year is almost coming to an end and well the backpack is still in great condition no rips no nothing will for sure be using this backpack next school year and for many more years to come !!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Invest
customer_reviews.text: Just like an education being an investment, so it this backpack. Everyone called me crazy for buying a $70 backpack, but halfway through the semester their backpacks broke and they spent over $70 on the two backpacks from one school year. This thing is awesome, and I’m a student who has a lot to carry, and it sits so comfortably on the back. Also I know some were concerned about water bottles not fitting in the side, my huge 40 oz thermoflask fits perfectly in the side and doesn’t fall out or move at all.
customer_reviews.author: scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Backpack is too small
customer_reviews.text: Loved my old North Face backpack which I've had for 10 years now and decided to pick this backpack up. Not a good idea. This backpack is way too small to fit anything inside. A laptop, 1.5 inch binder, and a small book was already enough to fill up this backpack. Not only that, the pencil compartment part of the backpack constantly flops downward when you open the backpack, causing your pencils and utilities to fall out if it was unzipped beforehand. Extremely annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it - perfect for work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my workday laptop bag. Good quality. Looks nice and accommodates all of my needs. I really like it a lot. As others have mentioned, it has a hard time sitting up (it won't), as its rigid back combined with its narrow base make it top-heavy. It doesn't matter to me, but thought it was worth mentioning in case someone might find that annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: so perhaps not the best bag for me
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as my previous pack, but well made. Serves its purpose, but tight fitting. Other issue lack of flat bottom, so pack cannot not stand upright when packed with items. Due to stiff backboard designed to provide stability for notebook PC. I use to cycling gear, so perhaps not the best bag for me, but it still does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Squawk

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag but if you are a student and have a lot of binders and books this bag is going to be too small. I struggle fitting two 1 1/2 inch binders, a laptop.. ended up buying a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Andraea Theoharis

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well!
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy a cheap backpack that would last for a year, maybe two years. The bottom of the bag would always disintegrate or something would tear. This bag is worth the money and doesn't tear. It will be the last bag you need to buy for a long time. Mine is almost three years old now and still like new. It's not very big, but sufficient for a computer and a book or two. Great for a college student. I like the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good, lightweight pack. Problem is balance and pockets.
customer_reviews.text: Quality and aesthetics is definitely great, as always with Nike products. However, the backpack has a hard time balancing on the ground. The front pocket is placed higher on the backpack, and if you make it too heavy, the front droops down. There is no support for the front pocket, so keep the front light. I only were there was another pocket and a waist strap.
customer_reviews.author: Wiseiguana

customer_reviews.title: It does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice if the rear pocket went all the way to the bottom of the bag rather than stopping half way. I’d also like there to be a slot up top for a tube so I could use it with a bladder on day hikes, but I bought it to carry books and school supplies and it does that job well. The last little nit pick would be that no matter how you load the bag it won’t stand up on its own, it always falls on it back if left unsupported.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Feeling like a ninja turtle
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is pretty and functions very nicely. I have joyful pleasure in ownership of something made this well. Love the feeling of the zippers and used it so I could travel light on airplanes over the holidays. It sure beats lugging a bunch of crud around that you don’t need. Skip the luggage and just bring the one backpack. Travel light and in style. Love the color too and the internal layout is good for storing my essential items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BACKPACK!
customer_reviews.text: What a great backpack! I am more than thrilled about this and cannot wait to keep using it lol! PS, it fits a 17” laptop if you don’t put it in the spot for the laptop, worked just fine! Shoulder straps are padded and comfy, its streamlined so doesn’t feel bulky on your back, and has a compartment for everything! My Nalgene also fit in the side pouch! 8 thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I am a high school student, and while I have a lot of materials in my backpack, it was well taken care of and not abused. That being said, the strap has ripped off at the top on the right shoulder, after 1 year, which is ridiculous considering my many cheaper backpacks have lasted way longer. They are not as spacious as they seem, but that is just the style. Other north face backpacks I have not heard of problems with, but this particular one has not lived up to the standards that I expected from North Face.
customer_reviews.author: Megan K.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: We went through 3 character backpacks last year from JC Penney & Walmart, cheap brand names i must add. We knew we wanted something more heavy duty for 4th grade and this has so far proven to withstand the books, the drops, and the hanging required for a larger than average 4th grade boy. The straps are wider with heavy seams and there is additional padding in the back to provide comfort when carrying. I foresee this back pack lasting through the year and possibly continued use as a back up or family laptop backpack for travel.
customer_reviews.author: fabuloustoni

customer_reviews.title: It does not feel cheap at all
customer_reviews.text: This product looks and feels very good. The quality is great. The only downfall is that it does not stand when its empty. You have to put books in there to keep it upright. But i'm okay with that. This is a great product. Love the colour
customer_reviews.author: yolanda

customer_reviews.title: best bag for school
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter who said she needed a new "book bag" that could double for a "regular" back pack. She says that this is the ultimate bag for her and will not change! The colour is awesome and she states that there is enough room for her books as well as an extra set of work out clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality construction.
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited and loved the backpack, until the stitching on the main zipper pulled apart. He does not overstuff it or treat it roughly. We are very disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Janet T.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an all-purpose backpack with quality construction, simple styling, and practical features. My old Jester backpack served me so well thru over a decade of school, travelling, hiking, and everything in between.
customer_reviews.author: Zack G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been dying to get a north face backpack and I loved the look and color of this one! The only thing I’m not happy about is the way it’s shaped.. meaning when I put my work binder and stuff in there for whatever reason the lower half of the backpack doesn’t fill in and the top does and it looks like a hunchback lol. But it’s very comfortable to wear and I feel like the price was reasonable!
customer_reviews.author: HalesComet

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better in person!
customer_reviews.text: The backpack has a great design that I’ve been looking for and a colorway that I haven’t see in the wild. I chose the Urban print because it reminds me of the patchwork denim trend that I love.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Front pocket only 6 inches deep. Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Had jester backpacks for years, figured that this one would be no different. Apparently north face decided for seemingly no reason to cut the outer pocket in half. It now only goes down the first 1/3 of the bag. I cannot comprehend what possible purpose this serves. This is now functionally a one-pocket backpack. Not even remotely worth it. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peirce

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack, durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Good backpack. The shape of it is slightly weird. the bottom is bigger than the top so it is sometimes hard to put something in the bottom even though it fits in the bottom. But it is a very good bag with a decent sized water bottle holder and good durability. Use it for high school and it fits all my folders/school supplies and lunch.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: the size is great not too big but not too small and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a backpack for general use and for traveling, this one seems to have fit my needs almost perfectly. the size is great not too big but not too small and the quality is actually well put together (but its north face and they usually fit the description of you get what you pay for) some of the travel sites i was researching recommended the jester for its size and travel convenience since some airlines can be a little bit too picky The straps are comfy but I probably wouldnt be using this like a daypack.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Kim

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: This particular BACKPACK may look big, but looks can be deceiving...the design on front, is literally a design...my middle schooler had trouble packing his stuff in it, but insisted on keeping it???
customer_reviews.author: Smlilly1

customer_reviews.title: High School use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Sophomore son, he likes it and it’s holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie S.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stand up straight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag because I really liked the last one that I had. Unfortunately, they changed the bag so that it doesn't stand up properly, so putting things inside it is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: jmcg10

customer_reviews.title: Crusty zipper path
customer_reviews.text: Right so when I bought this, I didn’t really have the time to review the product and before you know it, 30 days had already gone by. When I got the chance to review the product, it seemed durable and good quality but the zipper was randomly getting stuck at some places and the zipper path seemed kinda of crusty when the zipper glided across. Other than that everything else is pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Weird but working out for me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this backpack for school and when I got it I noticed the front/smaller compartment does use up space from the main. I'm not sure if that how this brand makes their backpacks but it's working out for me so far. Still roomy and yet not too huge. The weird layout is keeping me from over filling the bag and thinking about where everything is at inside. I would suggesting comparing models before buying the first you find for North Face brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Huante

customer_reviews.title: Smaller but awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of this backpack. I bought it to replace my north face hotshot backpack. They’re about the same size. This bag does fall in its face a lot because it’s too heavy. Otherwise I like it
customer_reviews.author: Cari Chastain

customer_reviews.title: Carries all school books.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson picked this out for a Christmas present. He loves it. Says it is exactly what he wanted. I don't know much about it myself except what he tells me. He is happy with it so that's good.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Markland

customer_reviews.title: Stylish yet practical and comfy backpack! A+!
customer_reviews.text: My teen uses this as her Daily School back pack. She says it is very comfortable, fits all her books, planner And more... Her contigo water bottle fits nicely in the exterior side pocket. The color is even more stylish and vibrant in person than online photo. She has not used the laptop pocket since she has a separate laptop bag, but it is a nice interior feature.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Great Day Pack and Very Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great day pack and very nice quality. I wish it was a full clam shell that unzipped all the way down but it’s not a deal breaker. Other than that it has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Spence

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect to have the chest clip last
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack with lots of pockets, however its definitely lacking quality. The chest clip fell apart the first time using it, that was part of what sold me on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vic B

customer_reviews.title: Love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I get complements on this backpack all the time. It’s lightweight even with my laptops, tablet, notepads, binder, power cables and mouse. It’s hardy and withstands bouncing around the back of my vehicle. Love this brand in general.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack ever!
customer_reviews.text: My son chose this as a gift for his birthday, and he loves it! It's durable, stylish, sturdy, holds everything he needs for high school every day, and doubles as a backpack for campouts. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: T. Bell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well made product, just like all North Face gear! It's well constructed & zippers are sturdy. Great size - it holds a lot but isn't bulky. Well organized in its design. Colors are great and fabric is easy to clean. Highly recommend this backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Pennie1961

customer_reviews.title: overall pretty nice bag
customer_reviews.text: bag looks great, and the materials are nice too, just one tiny problem for me, the side pockets for water bottom and umbrella is a not too flexible, i holds okay but when it comes to big water bottoms, it will slip out of it when you walk.
customer_reviews.author: Teng Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack! Made well & definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, well made of course, it’s North Face. Great price. Got it quickly & faster than estimated, which is always great to have happen. Definitely worth buying IMO. Good, solid, purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Loveeee it
customer_reviews.text: It was a gif for my son. He loves North Face backpack. The color is beautiful and everything also. The price was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Monika68

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best name brand ever! I’m a north face fan and I love the Blue! I take this everywhere with me to carry my items. Sometimes my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Vernie

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack that lasts
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sturdy backpack that will last a school year or two and is good for hiking trips. But dirt and dust may build up on the little fold in the front so clean it often.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely rocks.
customer_reviews.text: Tremendously classic british army green and khaki styling and you can just FEEL the envy of passing hikers on the trail...It may well be the best backpack ever. (I'm sort of happy with it.)
customer_reviews.author: Thunder Gene

customer_reviews.title: This is only a waste of money if kids NEVER return to physical school. But they will :)
customer_reviews.text: Great product, never disappointed with NorthFace. The size and comfort of back back was much better for my fifth grader. I expect it to hold up for some years. But since school became digital, he hadn’t had to use it too much. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is so great! I don't use it for outdoor activities but it's always on my at school. I've had it for a year and it hasn't showed any signs of breaking down, unlike many of my other backpacks. I will be using this backpack for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Ready for middle school!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved her new backpack for school. She just started middle school and everything fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: neysha marrero

customer_reviews.title: Welp
customer_reviews.text: Well I ordered a black one and got navy blue, which is fine still a nice color, and I think it’s more expensive so 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Davian luera

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this backpack for college and I love it so much! It’s perfect for carrying my text books, binders, and laptop to and from class. Great quality! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: We’re looking for backpacks for Alaska trip that would serve well and be small enough to fit under train seats while there. Quality product from NorthFace as always.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. F. Sisti

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Teenage son loves it. Perfect size for high school and as a carry on. Can’t beat the price I paid for it here on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: MSil

customer_reviews.title: Laptop backpack
customer_reviews.text: Good for a laptop and some papers, files or notebooks. I wanted something more like a day pack to carry clothes and travel gear so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Reign

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and compact
customer_reviews.text: North Face delivers again with a small yet versatile backpack with many compartments. My only complaint is that the bag does not seem to want to stand upright.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Love this versatile backpack-used for work and can also use for camping/hiking. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: High quality, love that it's low profile on your back also love the color.
customer_reviews.author: madi

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for work. This North Face backpack is solid and feels as if it should hold up well from the daily grind for many years. That’s all I can ask for at a reasonable price, I’m happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable I wish it was bigger, but that’s not the bags fault! Very durable, looks good, and very comfortable to wear!
customer_reviews.author: Wade Jones

customer_reviews.title: Cool pack.
customer_reviews.text: Hey, my teenager boy absolutely loves it and uses it for school. No complaints from him. And that’s exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: DuskySky

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack. My high schooler uses it. It fits all of his books and his lunch. Very durable and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Crazedfruit

customer_reviews.title: My son really likes it his back pack!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son. He’s 17 and kinda rough on the backpacks. He really likes this one. It’s a good quality full sized bag.
customer_reviews.author: In My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic backpack
customer_reviews.text: Nice basic backpack. Gave it 3 stars because I also ordered the Borealis women's backpack from NorthFace, and it is much nicer and higher quality. Paid the same price for both. Would definitely recommend the Borealis vs the Jester.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Ebert

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: My son uses This for school. Super durable, lots of pockets. Love all North Face products.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Shallower small pocket then previous version.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, previous version has a full depth front pocket. This new version has a shallower front. Otherwise great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Nathanson

customer_reviews.title: Durable Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this backpack at the beginning of school and we’re now about ready for Christmas break and it still looks brand new! Very durable and trendy!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson. He loves it. It looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Authentic!
customer_reviews.text: The bag arrived fast & in excellent/ brand new condition! I love it! North Face has an amazing quality and the color I picked is perfect for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Sophos

customer_reviews.title: son loves it
customer_reviews.text: this is his 2nd North Face in 8 years. Amazing quality
customer_reviews.author: Wareagleparsons

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter uses this pack for college. Very durable, well made. Served her college needs very well.
customer_reviews.author: dynaman04

customer_reviews.title: Colors varied
customer_reviews.text: The color is much darker than displayed on line. Not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdy

customer_reviews.title: Great For Work
customer_reviews.text: My favorite backpack. I purchased this for work as a telecommuter. It holds my laptop, dock, and mobile printer. Super durable and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hawes

customer_reviews.title: Lots of compartments and storage for trips
customer_reviews.text: Use this primarily as diaper bag/kids bag for trips and day outings. Works well and room for everything. Used the front pockets for storage of charging cords, extra power pack etc and main pocket for diapers, wipes and snacks. Extra water bottles fit in side mesh pockets well. Holds up well and love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT BACKPACK FOR COLLEGE!!!
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 recommend for college students. The two water bottle pockets fit any water bottle! ( including hydroflasks) the back of this backpack is extra supportive and the laptop pocket is perfect with padding on both sides of the pocket. A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor H.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product for our 15-year old granddaughter. Exactly what she wanted. Backpack looks very sturdy. Arrived quickly. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jack B.

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious w/o bulkiness
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these before in high school. It worked great! Never had any problems with it. Always had enough space to carry anything I needed and not having a super bulky bag on my back. Very sleek. As always north face is an awesome brand and never disappoints. The reflective material on this backpack is also really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan jofre

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: We have been buying just a standard backpack for 3 years now and they fall apart less than halfway through the year. Investing in this Northface backpack was the best decision! Great backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: not enough amazing things to say about this backpack!! Bought it for my bf for our one year and he loves it. He is an engineering student and says it’s very comfy and roomy for all of his books and notebooks :)
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful great but....
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful backpack. Comes with a blow whistle on the strap. Great for travel and school. My laptop fits perfectly, and the only downside for me is the front pocket ... just wish it was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Sham Bhai

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like how durable this backpack is-very sturdy and good-looking! I do wish it was a little bigger on the inside though. If you have a lot of textbooks I do not recommend, but if you're like me and just need your laptop, a few notebooks, and a tablet-it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Size is great and very easy to carry a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: AJ G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Large, sturdy backpack for a kid who brings tons of books home every night.
customer_reviews.author: David Olivet

customer_reviews.title: Books
customer_reviews.text: It’s was a gift for a family member He love it He loves being black, not flashy books
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Supportive Backpack
customer_reviews.text: My daughter picked this out as she will actually wear this one on both shoulders, fits better than other brands
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Goocher

customer_reviews.title: What bothers me is that I ordered a Falcon Brown bag and it looks nothing like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The bag is ok, doesn't feel cheap at all. What bothers me is that I ordered a Falcon Brown bag and it looks nothing like the picture. The colored part of the bag looks lighter in the picture while it's rather dark. The NF logo looks also pretty dark compared to the lighter color in the picture. Everything else looks the same, but I don't know if I like it TBH. I wish the pictures were more reliable in contrast to the real product.
customer_reviews.author: RodrigoF

customer_reviews.title: Looks stylish. Can fit many things and feels nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks stylish. Can fit many things and feels nice! Not sure the durability but confident in NF products as I have owned another backpack by NF and it is still great!
customer_reviews.author: Hossein

customer_reviews.title: Well designed day pack
customer_reviews.text: Compact and comfortable. This is a well designed day pack, great for hiking and traveling. Nice color
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Smaller men's pack
customer_reviews.text: Small & compact but will hold a gallon of milk w Room left over.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

product_meta.title: THE NORTH FACE Jester, TNF Black, One Size
feature_bullets: Padded laptop sleeve in the main compartment protects your device from bumps and falls
Large main compartment for books and binders
Front compartment with internal organisation, featuring an extra padded tablet sleeve, a pen slots and additional secure-zip pockets
Reflective bike-light loop, water bottle tabs and shoulder-strap webbing create 360 degrees of reflectivity to make you more visible in low light
Updated front elastic bungee system for external storage
